item.title: JPMorgan Reportedly Highlights Investors Are Losing Faith In Software As AI Advances – Sector ‘Is Now Being Sentenced Before Trial’
item.description: JPMorgan Chase & Co. said sentiment toward software companies has grown notably harsher, with valuations now punished before firms can make their case...

item.title: ENPH Stock Is Soaring Pre-Market Today — Why Did Enphase Shares Get An Upgrade?
item.description: BMO Capital upgraded Enphase to ‘Market Perform’ from ‘Underperform,’ while hiking the price target to $41 from $31.

item.title: Tether CEO Says $20B Funding Target Was A 'Misconception' After Reality Check From Investors: Report
item.description: According to a report by the Financial Times, advisers involved in Tether’s fund raise discussions floated a much smaller raise of around $5 billion.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Aclarion CEO Looks To Bigger AI MedTech’s Playbook To Reverse Fortunes
item.description: CEO Brent Ness noted a broad global market, with approximately 266 million people affected by chronic low back pain.

item.title: ONDS Stock Rises Premarket: What Is Driving The Stock Up?
item.description: Ondas stock is set to gain for a third straight session if premarket gains hold and bolster the stock’s already optimism-fueled rally.
